paper_abstract: An Artin-Schreier tower over the finite field F-p is a tower of field extensions generated by polynomials of the form X-P - X - alpha. Following Cantor and Couveignes, we give algorithms with quasilinear time complexity for arithmetic operations in such towers. As an application, we present an implementation of Couveignes' algorithm for computing isogenies between elliptic curves using the p-torsion. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fast arithmetics in Artin-Schreier towers over finite fields
